code: import React from'react';export const DisplayBoard=_ref=>{let{numberOfMovies,getAllMovies}=_ref;const headerStyle={width:'100%',padding:'2%',backgroundColor:"red",color:'white',textAlign:'center'};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{backgroundColor:'teal'},className:"display-board"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{style:{color:'navy'}},"Movies Created"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"number"},numberOfMovies),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"btn"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"button",onClick:e=>getAllMovies(),className:"btn btn-warning"},"Get all Movies")));};
